example.parse: (TOP (S (CONJ وَ) (PP-TMP (NOUN مُنذُ) (NP (NP (NOUN ٱِسْتِخْدام) (NP (DET+NOUN البِتْرَول) (DET+ADJ العَرَبِيّ))) (PP (PREP فِي) (NP (NP (DEM_PRON_MS هَذا)) (NP (DET+NOUN المَوقِف)))))) (PRT (CONJ وَ)) (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لا)) (IV3MS+IV يَكف) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG الاِخْوَة) (DET+NOUN العَرَب)) (PP-CLR (PREP عَن) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+NSUFF_FEM_SG مِعايْرَة) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN_PROP مِصْر)) (PP-CLR (PREP بِ) (NP (PRON_3MS هِ))))))) (PUNC ,)))
